titleStmt.title: A sermon of the nature and necessitie of godly feare Preached in the Cathedrall Church of Chester, in September, 1614.
titleStmt.author: Case, William, 1584 or 5-1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] for Edmund Weauer, and are to sould at the great south-dore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
